item.title: Benavidez stops bloodied Yarde to retain title
item.description: Briton Anthony Yarde's third shot at a world title ended in disappointment as he was stopped by WBC light-heavyweight champion David Benavidez.

item.title: Could the Budget help turn Generation Z into generation debt?
item.description: There's growing concern that current tax and spending policies help pensioners, but are unfair on younger generations.

item.title: Mum of two left penniless by Tinder scammer
item.description: A mother of two tells the BBC she felt "embarrassed" and "stupid" after giving her savings away to a fraudster she met online.

item.title: Why Tommy Robinson supporters are turning to Christianity
item.description: The Church of England is grappling with what to do about followers of the far-right figure embracing faith.

item.title: Rupert Grint: 'I'll never step out of Ron Weasley's shadow'
item.description: The actor told the BBC he's written a letter to the next child actor playing Ron in the upcoming HBO TV adaptation of the books.
